sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-manager-profile', templateUrl: './manager-profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./manager-profile.component.css'] }) export class ManagerProfileComponent implements OnInit{ reactiveForm : FormGroup; ngOnInit(): void { this.reactiveForm= new FormGroup({ firstName: new FormControl[''], lastName: new FormControl[''], email: new FormControl[''], department_name: new FormControl[''], address: new FormControl[''], gender: new FormControl[''], phone_no: new FormControl[''], skillId: new FormControl[''], }) } submitForm() { } }
